radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar atelectasis. No pleural or pericardial effusion. Small-bowel loops are distended and fluid-filled with no transition point. A small partially rim enhancing fluid collection adjacent to the appendiceal stump measuring 3.1 x 2.5 cm. Another small fluid collection with adjacent surgical material in the slightly more central pelvis measuring 3.4 x 2.1 cm. The kidneys are of normal and symmetric size with normal nephrogram. Renal cysts measure up to 2.5 cm on the right. No evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture.
